short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically track and save Google Meet participants in a convenient side panel. Never lose track of who attended your meetings!

# Meet Attendance Tracker

Track and manage attendance in your Google Meet sessions automatically. Perfect for teachers, team leads, and event organizers who need to monitor meeting participation.

## How It Works

1. Create or join a Google Meet session
2. The extension automatically detects the meeting
3. Add your expected attendees list
4. Watch as the extension tracks attendance in real-time

## Privacy & Security
â€¢ Works entirely within your browser
â€¢ No data sent to external servers
â€¢ All data stored locally in your browser
â€¢ No login required

## Free Features
â€¢ Unlimited meetings
â€¢ Unlimited attendee tracking
â€¢ Full attendee management
â€¢ Real-time monitoring
â€¢ Import/Export capabilities

Get organized and stop manually tracking attendance - let Meet Attendance Tracker do the work for you!

Note: This extension is not affiliated with Google Meet. It is an independent tool designed to enhance your Google Meet experience.
